item.description: The database client every command line junkie deserves.

item.title: coollabsio/coolify
item.description: An open-source, self-hostable PaaS alternative to Vercel, Heroku & Netlify that lets you easily deploy static sites, databases, full-stack applications and 280+ one-click services on your own servers.

item.title: pingcap/tidb
item.description: TiDB - the open-source, cloud-native, distributed SQL database designed for modern applications.

item.description: A user friendly TUI for SQL databases. Written in python. Supports SQL server, Mysql, PostreSQL, SQLite, Turso and more.

item.title: dolthub/go-mysql-server
item.description: A MySQL-compatible relational database with a storage agnostic query engine. Implemented in Go.

item.description: A Terminal Client for MySQL with AutoCompletion and Syntax Highlighting.

item.title: dbgate/dbgate
item.description: Database manager for MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MongoDB, SQLite and others. Runs under Windows, Linux, Mac or as web application
